Descripcion: Intravenous 2 is the ultimate blend of tactical gameplay and immersive storytelling. Will you embrace the shadows or confront your foes head-on? The choice is yours. Experience a new era of tactical stealth action. Save lives. Uncover secrets. Take vengeance.

Nombre: Once upon a Dungeon - Infinity Demo
Descripcion: Travel through dark dungeons, defeat dangerous creatures, and collect unique loot as you play endlessly in this hardcore, traditional roguelike.

Tidebound is a fishing and inventory management game with a relaxing, casual atmosphere. Catch, sell, upgrade your boat, and sail further to catch more expensive and exotic sea animals. Casual yet engaging, the game offers a sense of progress with tons of equipment and hundreds of species to catch.

Dice 'n Goblins is a turn-based RPG that blends luck and strategy as you battle using dice rolls. Master your skills, chain powerful combos, and overcome the whims of fortune. Collect loot, upgrade your gear, and craft the ultimate dice pool to face monsters and other foes lurking in the shadows!

Starfell is a combo-builder turn-based combat roguelike game with a unique astrology theme. Build your skill deck and defeat the boss with one of 12 distinct stargazer heroes. Strategize your best skill combos and prepare to face challenging and diverse enemies.

HEXAROMA is a strategy based charming little island village builder. Dive into a relaxing yet challenging experience where you strategize the best hexagon island placements in this cute little city builder game. Place the building pieces strategically, grow your village and your tiny island.

Nombre: Mika and The Witch's Mountain Soundtrack
Descripcion: This coming-of-age journey will take us to the top of the mountain through a story of effort, friendship, and community; and will let our hearts fly free.

Dice 'n Goblins is a turn-based RPG blends luck and strategy as you battle using dice rolls. Master your skills, chain powerful combos, and overcome the whims of fortune. Collect loot, upgrade your gear, and craft the ultimate dice pool to face monsters and others foes lurking in the shadows!

Mini City: Mayhem is a chaos-filled city-builder where you build against time. Become the mayor of a tiny town, plop down tiny building blocks to build a working city to progress. Manage your roads and building connections. But be quick, because time is ticking!

Verlet Ascend is a physics based, action platformer with roguelike mechanics, a fully destructable procedurally generated environment, and rope swing physics. Fight creatures, loot enemies, upgrade your character, and climb your way up in an endless parkour.

The opening act of Ankora: Lost Days. Discover the beginning of this adventure and explore freely around this mysterious world full of promise and danger. Craft different tools, build structures and terraform yourself a new home in the opening act of this cute-as-heck survival game.

The Verge Miner is an immersive mining, base defense, and action roguelike game. Jump through asteroids on The Verge of the universe, and mine valuable resources. These uncharted rocks are filled with exogens you need to protect yourself against. Choose and upgrade gear for your play style.

Nombre: Mika and The Witch's Mountain Demo
Descripcion: Mika and the Witch’s Mountain is a fantasy adventure about an aspiring witch who delivers packages to the townspeople of a small island. Explore every cranny and soar through the sky with your magic broom.

Mini City: Mayhem is a chaos-filled city-builder where you build against time. Become the mayor of a tiny town, plop down tiny building blocks to build a working city to progress. Manage your roads and building connections. But be quick, because time is ticking!
Editor: Rogue Duck Interactive, The 4 Winds Entertainment

Descripcion: Kingdom's Deck is a card-based city-builder where you build and protect your Kingdom from the enemy siege. Build your deck, deploy your cards wisely, defend your walls, manage your resources, respond to various events that will shape your city, and create the ultimate Kingdom's deck!
This is the soundtrack of "X-Angel," containing 16 original tracks.

HEXAROMA is a strategy based charming little island village builder. Dive into a relaxing yet challenging experience where you strategize the best hexagon island placements in this cute little city builder game. Place the building pieces strategically, grow your village and your tiny island.

Kingdom's Deck is a card-based city-builder where you build and protect your Kingdom from the enemy siege. Build your deck, deploy your cards wisely, defend your walls, manage your resources, respond to various events that will shape your city, and create the ultimate Kingdom's deck!

Nombre: The Art of Summer in Mara
Descripcion: The official artbook from Summer in Mara with over 180 pages of concept art, background, key art, characters, and props.

A demo of Summer in Mara. Discover the beginning of this adventure and take care of your island by harvesting your crops, fishing on your pond, and cooking. Enjoy the opening act to this farming adventure.

Nombre: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
Descripcion: Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.

Dive into the charming Stories of Mara, an episodic slice of life tale about a diverse cast of characters. Get to know your neighbours and bond with them, but… Could you make them stick together to help each other?
Viral Virar is an arcade running game with beautiful pixel art. Collect and upgrade 5 different runners with unique powers to reach to the end!
Deiland: Pocket Planet is a farming adventure where you will have to take care of your tiny planet. Farm, craft, fight and explore the universe of Deiland.

You are a cat on a robot vacuum cleaner. Which means you are bus driver in the cat world! Dodge obstacles, pop innocent kids' baloons, dash through buildings to collect your fellow cat pussengers. Meow Express is a cute, fun and annoying casual arcade game, just like our furry friends.

Nombre: Koa and the Five Pirates of Mara - Demo
Descripcion: Join Koa and her best friend Napopo on an action-packed adventure through the islands of Mara! Outwit traps, manoeuvre dangerous environments, and explore a series of dazzlingly different landscapes on their quest to recover stolen pirate loot.
Step into a bizarre and grotesque world where chaos reigns and monstrous creatures clash in epic battles. In this thrilling multiplayer experience.
A cross-platform multiplayer real-time strategy fantasy war game set in the Middle Ages. No ads, no P2W, 100% free since 1993. Also available for iOS, Android, and Mac platforms.

Experience tactically challenging turn-based strategy in the hostile island world of Mantaria. Command a dynamic army of various unit types and classes to slay a dark and possessed undead army. Train forces into powerful warriors and fight fervently until the snake's head is at your feet!
Are you tired of corporate life? Create your own farm! Plant vegetables and fruits, harvest crops, employ workers, take care of animals. Buy farm equipment, manage employees and just relax!
Rogue Masters is a 6 player co-op horde survival game with souls-like combat and extensive character customization where you fight Entropy in long-lost civilizations.

Deep Sky Derelicts: New Prospects, the first expansion to Deep Sky Derelicts, introduces a number of new features and upgrades that open up exciting prospects for the scavengers roaming the DSD world. These include new locations, a brand new class, new enemies, new exploration mechanics, new side missions, and lots more!
Experience the intricate dioramas and connections of your life, and the ripples we all make, in this award-winning narrative puzzle game about death, loss, and mental health.
The official Noita soundtrack by From Grotto & Niilo Takalainen.

Station Life, the second expansion to Deep Sky Derelicts, turns the station, your scavenger home and safe haven, into a lively hub! With new bounty contracts, random encounters, station dweller interactions, and the Inventor recruit introduced, players will have plenty to do between raids.

■Work every day and if you save enough money, you can go and meet your girl.■BlackSmith lower his hammer. Click at the exact moment that the hammer lands. The better your timing is, the more experience points you'll get.■The higher your experience points, the more expensive you can sell your products.
Coloring Game 2 is a sequel of the existing color-by-number game which so many users have liked. The sequel features new options and images.
One More Dungeon is a first person shooter roguelike with procedurally generated levels and pixel-art graphics.

Nombre: Cities: Skylines - Content Creator Pack: High-Tech Buildings
Descripcion: Add a splash of "archi-technology" to the city with fifteen new creations from Mauro "GCVos" Vos, created exclusively for this content pack. Ten new unique buildings plus five technologically advanced city service buildings will have your town ready for a better tomorrow!

The Portal Mod you've been waiting for. Delve into a new story with original characters, spanning over 8 hours of gameplay and featuring over 40 new challenging test chambers which make use of new mechanics.

Divide squares and evade obstacles. Simple minimalist game that can train your reactions and some move strategies. Just click your mouse button and squares will split. But after short time they will move to each other again so you need to click fast to keep them divided.

Get the official soundtrack for Passpartout and support our beloved composers! All revenue from this package goes directly into the pockets of our composers Synkronosaurus! Reach out to them at facebook.com/synkronosaurus or @synkronosaurus
HordeCore is a kick-ass side-scrolling shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play alone, or as a team - and destroy, survive, craft, and explore!

Dead End Job sends you into a madcap, Ren & Stimpy-esque world to bust up ghosts. It’s a procedurally generated, couch co-op, twin-stick shooter that straps a vacuum pack to your back and puts a plasma blaster in your hand. For you, it’s just another day in the office.

Welcome to Corporate Lockdown, the first expansion pack for Alien: Isolation. This pack features three all-new maps:for Survivor Mode, a time-based challenge to test your skills. Can you evade the Alien for long enough to survive or will you try to take the Alien head-on?
Desarrollador: Creative Assembly, Feral Interactive (Mac), Feral Interactive (Linux)

Descripcion: Sticky Apps :: Monitor Ping is an application to view your network connection to multiple systems on the Internet. This is a great way to monitor your PING/network to game servers, video streaming servers, or your ISP in general.

Incredible combination of roguelike, RPG and group strategy. Immerse yourself in the wild nature of a mysterious world, make enemies or friends, build settlements or go in search of inexplicable artifacts... It all depends on your choice, but remember that every mistake can be your last!

Nombre: Hidden Capybaras with Orange and Pumpkins: Spooky Halloween Edition
Descripcion: Celebrate Halloween night with cute capybaras with orange! Find all the hidden capybaras in their Halloween costumes and light up the town on this magical night. A fun-filled adventure awaits you!
矛盾を見つけ、相談者の悩みを解決する怪異判定アドベンチャー

《Back》 is a full-motion audio live horror game. Special Note 1: This game is very supernatural and scary, timid or heart disease players do not buy ！！！！ The game will reveal different ending plots step by step through various searches and choices for your character.
Neko girls are ready to serve! They are ready to wash your clothes, shine your shoes, clean your house, even give you a massage if you need it...(^ ∇ ^ *)

A completely free online multiplayer text-based RPG game. No pay to win, no pay for perks, COMPLETELY free. Experience roleplay, PvP, PvE, and more in a vast fantasy world with in-depth history. Enjoy 21 races and 17 classes in an ever-evolving world.
"What if I, an ordinary chicken delivery man, have a chance to win a 1-million-dollar prize?" What kind of ending can they reach in the battle over love and money?
Our main character, absorbed in the study of sects and the occult, made a big mistake by going to an abandoned farm.
Welcome to the survival horror clicker! Try to save a chicken egg and at the same time your life.

The player finds himself in an abandoned school, which was once a place of study for local schoolchildren. The protagonist is a paranormal researcher who came here to solve the mystery that shrouds this gloomy location.

Click Click Dig is an idle mining game that lets you dig deep into the core of several planets. The prologue contains a unique planet, unique digger skins, and a store where you can unlock exclusive items in the main Click Click Dig game!
Chill incremental game about dice making money. 🎲 Upgrade your dice to make more money, to upgrade your dice to make even more money! 😲🤯

A Cookie Clicker-style hentai game where the protagonist ends up with a wolf-girl as his roommate. As you gather clicks and resources, you unlock increasingly intimate interactions and special moments with her, deepening your bond and uncovering her true nature.
The misfortunes of the unskilled magician who just wanted to make some money and not get into any troubles.

After your death due to a car accident, you have been summoned by the goddess to take care of a tavern in an Isekai world. Your job is to hire different girls from various tribes and races to help out the business there, as well as build up room by room of the tavern to expand the business.
Take on relentless waves of zombies in this intense FPS survival game. Level up, upgrade your weapons, and see how long you can survive.
Do you have what it takes to survive the Combat Casino?

Nombre: Train Simulator: Southwestern Expressways: Reading - Exeter Route Add-On
Descripcion: Hundreds of miles and detail galore, Just Trains’ Southwestern Expressways spans 4 counties and is ready to be explored now in Train Simulator!

Scalie Seduction is a fun, sexy adventure that brings you face to face with a smokin’ hot dragon babe who will definitely light your fire. This dragon is horny as hell; she really puts the "lay" in "dragonslayer." This is compatible with many devices at once for an intense experience.

Upgrade your SnowRunner vehicle collection with the Land Rover Dual Pack, bringing two generations of the legendary Land Rover Defender, faithfully rebuilt for the first time in SnowRunner. Not included in the Year 1 Pass or Year 2 Pass.

You’re all alone in the universe, you’re the last of your kind. The only thing you have left is your spacecraft with intelligent robots. To survive, you’ll have to collect materials and supplies up to the spacecraft, and upgrade your gear. But you meet some unidentified creatures along your way.

Immerse yourself in Farmer Toon, a unique 3D farm management experience ! Cultivate your land, raise adorable animals and creatively manage your farm. Trade with other players online, take part in online challenges and special events. Farmer Toon awaits you for an adventure rich in discovery !
Relaxing puzzle game, artistic photo beauty, let you have a good mood Click on the dlc to get 40% off the bundle

Nombre: Dungeon Travelers: To Heart 2 in Another World
Descripcion: The dungeon is dangerous and deep, but with the right party, you can conquer every nook and cranny. Find loot, equip your party, and customize your classes to master the turn-based RPG combat in this old-school dungeon crawler!

Heart Abyss is a brutal action-platformer inspired by Japan during the 17th and 18th centuries. Wake up your inner beast and take vengeance on those who put a collar around your neck. Find your sister and uncover the mystery behind the disappearance of all jinkos.

Combo Card Clashers is a roguelike deckbuilder meets auto battler! Build massive combos by playing all cards each turn. Unlock powerful card synergies, recruit monsters to be your allies, upgrade gears and skills - give it all to brave through a mysterious world.
这是一段发生在高中校园内纯情青涩的百合恋爱故事。曾经无数次注视她的脸颊，想要将她拥入怀中，让她倾听自己当下的全部情感，却总在她对未来的期望中止步不前……学生时代的恋爱会无疾而终，还是还得偿所愿？
Forgetting the busyness and coldness of daily life, we sometimes gaze at the flames and then at ourselves. It would be nice to have such a time.

“Massive debt, a shabby brothel, and a naughty succubus… This is all I get for defeating the Demon God?!” Hire monster girls to attract customers and pay off your debts! Don't forget to give your girls lots of hands-on job training!
Expand your adventure with the Season Pass! Includes new gameplay experiences and a quest with dedicated in-game reward.
Assemble your most expensive burger from whatever you can find in the kitchen.

Rebuild the remnants of humanity and conquer the Milky Way in this grand strategy game. Colonize systems and corner markets, or lead your fleets to victory in real-time battles. Reclaim Earth, or terraform new worlds.

"SKIBIDI: ESCAPE FROM TOILETS" is a cooperative horror game for 1-4 players. TV MANs are trying to get through creepy and atmospheric locations that are filled with dangerous SKIBIDI - they want to kill you! Free content updates with new levels and game modes - YES YES YES!
A text-based RPG with turn-based combat, dice rolls, and difficult choices. Set out on a mysterious quest in The Mists, where truth fades and reality bends.
EleBall is a casual platformer about a circus elephant, who tries their best to catch falling objects while simultaneously keeping balance on a bouncy ball.

LOW, a first-person Horror Game, immerses players in the dark prelude of BrokenLore's story. Set in a mist-shrouded Japanese village, players uncover deep-seated hatred and ancient secrets. Navigate a hyperrealistic, claustrophobic environment where supernatural forces and tragic cycles abound.

"It Was Raining That Night" is an erotic visual novel that takes you on an adventure in the world of the mafia. With an engaging storyline and attractive characters, you're sure to get lost in the experience. Will you reign supreme or fall?
Sleepwalk is an indie survival horror game, the story begins with the player waking up in an unknown and dark place, trying to escape and discover hidden secrets with no memory of their arrival.
